entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
